name: Asteroids Pachi
description:
Asteroids meets DoDon Pachi

WASD for movement, mouse for rotation

LEFT MOUSE = Focus Fire

RIGHT MOUSE = Spread Fire

SPACE + LEFT MOUSE = Hyper Mode

SPACE + RIGHT MOUSE = explode Bomb
